original_title: Lewis Hamilton: Life in the Fast Lane
overview: From obscurity to global celebrity - Lewis Hamilton is the No 1 sporting sensation in Great Britain at the moment - he has taken the world of Formula One by storm and proved this year to be the top young driver in the world.  Join us as we take a fast-paced ride through the life of one of Britain`s hottest sporting talents.  From his karting debut at the age of eight, through Formula Renault and Formula Three, this unofficial DVD charts Lewis`s rapid rise to the top. Packed with a feast of interviews, photos and plenty of racing footage, this is the only DVD that will let you inside the world of Lewis Hamilton.
title: Lewis Hamilton: Life in the Fast Lane
